medium: Acrylic and graphite pencil on canvas
text: The artist conceived this Minimalist painting as a flat, neutral surface. He had the canvas mechanically sprayed with acrylic paint and then subdivided it with pencil lines intersecting at right angles.
title: Four Squares within a Square II
